meanings.definition: A list of selected candidates for a job, prize, etc.
meanings.sent1: The shortlisted candidates were all very qualified for the position.
meanings.sent2: The company will announce the shortlisted names next week.
meanings.sent3: The shortlisted group had to complete a challenging obstacle course for fun.
meanings.sent4: Being on the shortlist felt like being part of an exclusive club.
meanings.sent5: The shortlisted individuals stood out from the rest with their impressive skills.

meanings.definition: To select or nominate for a shortlist.
meanings.sent1: The hiring manager shortlisted three candidates for the final interview.
meanings.sent2: She shortlisted her favorite books to read over the summer.
meanings.sent3: He shortlisted his friends for a surprise party at the park.
meanings.sent4: The coach shortlisted the top players for the championship game.
meanings.sent5: They shortlisted the best movies to watch during the weekend.
